attributes.action: reconsider any decision following the recent Ove Arup consultation that might lead to the dualling of the existing Port Road through the eastern edge of the village of Wenvoe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the entire process was seriously flawed and the matter of traffic flows in the eastern part of the Vale of Glamorgan needs to be reconsidered in it's entirety.
